<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>Update the Operational Work type field to allow null value for non operational resource plan</description>
        <name>AllowNullValueForOperationalWorkType</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[updateOperationalWorKTypeField();

function updateOperationalWorKTypeField() {
    var gr = new GlideRecord('sys_dictionary');
    gr.addQuery('name', 'resource_plan');
    gr.addQuery('element', 'operational_work_type');
	gr.setLimit(1);
    gr.query();

    if (gr.next()) {
        var oldChoiceValue = gr.getValue('choice');
        if (oldChoiceValue == 1) {
            gs.info('FixScript: AllowNullValueForOperationalWorkType: operational work type field already up to date');
			return;
        }
        gr.setValue('choice', '1');
        var id = gr.update();
        if (id)
            gs.info('FixScript: AllowNullValueForOperationalWorkType: Successfully able to update operational work type field.');
        else
            gs.info('FixScript: AllowNullValueForOperationalWorkType :Failed to update operational work type field.');
    } else
        gs.info('FixScript: AllowNullValueForOperationalWorkType: Unable to find the operational work type field.');
}]]></script>
